title: [Bug]: Zoom setting does not persist between app restarts
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

Zoom setting does not persist between app restarts.

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

2.0.14

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Change the zoom level
2. Restart teams
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
The zoom level should persist
```

### Debug

```markdown

```

### Additional context

I'm using Linux Mint 22.1 Cinnamon Edition
